subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark DeRosa hit a grand slam, Alfonso Soriano and Derrek Lee added bases-empty home runs, and the Chicago Cubs closed out a tumultuous weekend by defeating the Atlanta Braves, 10-1, yesterday to snap a six-game losing streak.
snippet: Mark DeRosa hit a grand slam, Alfonso Soriano and Derrek Lee added bases-empty home runs, and the Chicago Cubs closed out a tumultuous weekend by defeating the Atlanta Braves, 10-1, yesterday to snap a six-game losing streak.
